title: No plan for Trump-Putin meeting in ‘immediate future’, White House says – live
summary: The White House clarified that a planned meeting in Hungary involving the US president is no longer happening. An official noted that a productive call took place between Secretary Rubio and Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov. This announcement comes as part of ongoing diplomatic communications between the two countries.

title: Arsenal v Atlético Madrid: Champions League – live
summary: Diego Simeone's team is set to visit the Emirates Stadium. Scott Murray will provide minute-by-minute updates on the match. Stay tuned for live commentary and key moments.

title: Newcastle v Benfica, Villarreal v Manchester City and more: Champions League – live
summary: Yara El-Shaboury will provide updates on goals as the league stage of European football progresses. Fans can stay informed on key matches and scores throughout the week. Tune in for the latest highlights and updates from the leagues.

title: MPs lodge parliamentary motion to strip Prince Andrew of dukedom
summary: Ministers are under increasing pressure to respond to new allegations regarding a prince's ties with Jeffrey Epstein. The scrutiny over the prince's associations with the convicted sex offender intensifies calls for accountability. This development could potentially impact the royal family’s reputation and public trust.

title: Stuart Gulliver obituary
summary: An economic development strategist played a pivotal role in transforming Glasgow into a renowned cultural hub during the 1980s and 90s. Their initiatives significantly boosted the city's international reputation and cultural vibrancy. This legacy continues to influence Glasgow's identity today.
